```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# load in packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(kableExtra)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)

```


```{r}

napl_urchins <- read_csv(here("data", "urchins.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(date = ymd(date),
         year = year(date)) %>% 
  filter(year == "2010", 
         common_name == "Purple Urchin",
         site == "NAPL")

napl_urchins_stats <- napl_urchins %>% 
  group_by(treatment) %>% 
  summarize(mean_diameter_cm = mean(size),
            standard_deviation = sd(size),
            sample_size = n())

```
